required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: "Clinical Evaluation of Opto-Acoustic Tomography for Detection and Diagnostic Differentiation of Thyroid Nodules"
clinical_study.official_title: "Clinical Evaluation of Opto-Acoustic Tomography for Detection and Diagnostic Differentiation of Thyroid Nodules"

detailed_description.textblock: This is an early R&D Study

clinical_study.why_stopped: Revision to over all corporate strategy

primary_outcome.measure: Initial assessment of Imagio's ability to distinguish between benign and malignant thyroid nodules.
primary_outcome.description: The primary objective of this feasibility study is to provide an initial assessment of Imagio OA's ability to distinguish between benign and malignant thyroid nodules, and when appropriate, between benign and metastatic cervical lymph nodes in subjects.
